import sys
from math import gcd
input = sys.stdin.readline
t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    arr = [*map(int, input().split())]
    a = [0] + arr
    g = 0
    p = 0
    c = 1
    for i in range(2, n + 1):
        g = gcd(g, abs(a[i] - a[i - 1]))
        if g > 1:
            c = max(c, i - p)
        else:
            g = 0
            p = i
            while g != 1:
                sg = g
                g = gcd(g, abs(a[p] - a[p - 1]))
                p -= 1
            g = sg
    print(c)
    t -= 1
